tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE returned_items_feedback (
  feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  order_id INT,
  item_id INT,
  feedback_text TEXT,
  feedback_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE feedbacks (
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    item_id INT,
    feedback_text TEXT,
    rating FLOAT
);
CREATE TABLE items (
    item_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    item_name VARCHAR(255),
    item_category VARCHAR(50),
    return_date DATE,
    return_reason TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE returned_items (
 return_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 customer_id UUID,
 item_id UUID,
 return_reason STRING,
 return_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE returned_items (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    item_id INT,
    return_reason TEXT,
    return_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE feedback (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    item_id INT,
    feedback_text TEXT,
    rating INT
);
